file_insights.description: New server actions module for project management dashboard

patterns_discovered: Server-side Next.js actions with cache revalidation
Comprehensive error handling in server actions
Modular approach to project scanning and enrichment
Type-safe result interfaces for server actions
gotchas_discovered: Handling potential errors in project scanning
Ensuring type safety when returning results
Managing different scenarios in server actions
recommendations: Add more comprehensive logging for project scanning errors
Consider adding performance metrics for project refresh operations
Implement retry mechanisms for intermittent scanning failures
